column2: Column Description [Include meaning of any codes or flags used in data column as well as detection limits.]
GAM formula for the model being compared
the number of instances over the course of the all permutations of buffer and edge at this analysis scale that this model was within 2 points of having the lowest AIC score

the mean buffer value for all instances where this model was selected.
